body_html:
when you installed OpenMPI manually, you have to make sure libmpi.so files are in your LD_LIBRARY_PATH

See https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/168340/where-is-ld-library-path-how-do-i-set-the-ld-library-path-env-variable on how to use LD_LIBRARY_PATH

body:
when you installed OpenMPI manually, you have to make sure `libmpi.so` files are in your LD_LIBRARY_PATH

See https://unix.stackexchange.com/questions/168340/where-is-ld-library-path-how-do-i-set-the-ld-library-path-env-variable on how to use LD_LIBRARY_PATH
